abstract: Jeff Bezos, the chief executive of Amazon.com, is hoping that Kindle, an ambitious $399 electronic book device, will avoid the fate of other e-books.
snippet: Jeff Bezos, the chief executive of Amazon.com, is hoping that Kindle, an ambitious $399 electronic book device, will avoid the fate of other e-books.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Bezos knows that the world is not exactly clamoring for another way to read electronic books.

headline.main: Amazon Reading Device Doesn’t Need Computer
headline.print_headline: Amazon Reading Device Doesn’t Need Computer

abstract: Many people are criticizing Amazon’s Kindle for being too expensive and leaving out features. But doubtless Amazon will cut the price and add features over time. What Amazon has got right is the simplicity of finding, buying and reading books on the Kindle.
snippet: Many people are criticizing Amazon’s Kindle for being too expensive and leaving out features. But doubtless Amazon will cut the price and add features over time. What Amazon has got right is the simplicity of finding, buying and reading books on t...
lead_paragraph: A lot of people are writing off Amazon’s Kindle book reader much too quickly.
